00040   LaCropManager::LaCropManager(QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00041 : QDialog(parent,fl)
00042 {
00043     //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00044   setupUi(this);
00045   readSettings();
00046   lblCropPix->setScaledContents(true);
00047   connect(tblCrops, SIGNAL(cellClicked( int,int)),
00048       this, SLOT(cellClicked( int,int)));
00049   cbAreaUnits->addItem("Dunum");
00050   cbAreaUnits->addItem("Hectare");
00051   cbFodderEnergyType->addItem("KCalories");
00052   cbFodderEnergyType->addItem("TDN");
00053   refreshCropTable();
00054     //disable these buttons unless experimental is allowed
00055   pbnImport->setVisible(false);
00056   pbnExport->setVisible(false);
00057 }
00058 
00059 LaCropManager::~LaCropManager()
00060 {
00061   writeSettings();
00062 }

00064 void LaCropManager::readSettings()
00065 {
00066   QSettings mySettings;
00067   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00068   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(400, 400)).toSize();
00069   resize(size);
00070   move(pos);
00071 }
00072 
00073 void LaCropManager::writeSettings()
00074 {
00075   QSettings mySettings;
00076   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00077   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00078 }

00080 void LaCropManager::on_pbnCropPic_clicked()
00081 {
00082   LaUtils myUtils;
00083   QString myFile = myUtils.openGraphicFile();
00084   lblCropPix->setPixmap(myFile);
00085   mImageFile = myFile;
00086 }

00088 void LaCropManager::refreshCropTable(QString theGuid)
00089 {
00090 
00091   mCropMap.clear();
00092   tblCrops->clear();
00093   tblCrops->setRowCount(0);
00094   tblCrops->setColumnCount(2);
00095 
00096 
00097     //we do this in two passes
00098     //in the first pass we populate a qmap with all the layersets
00099     //we find....
00100   mCropMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCrops();
00101 
00102     //the second pass populates the table
00103     //doing it from the map ensures that the rows
00104     //are sorted by layerset name
00105 
00106   int mySelectedRow=0;
00107   int myCurrentRow=0;
00108   QMapIterator<QString, LaCrop> myIterator(mCropMap);
00109   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00110   {
00111     myIterator.next();
00112     LaCrop myCrop = myIterator.value();
00113     qDebug() << myCrop.toText();
00114     if (theGuid.isEmpty())
00115     {
00116       qDebug() << "No default active row was requested.Assigning to myCrop.guid()!";
00117       theGuid=myCrop.guid();
00118     }
00119     if (myCrop.guid()==theGuid)
00120     {
00121       mySelectedRow=myCurrentRow;
00122     }
00123       // Insert new row ready to fill with details
00124     tblCrops->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00125     QString myGuid = myCrop.guid();
00126     qDebug() << "Inserting crop with guid: " << myGuid;
00127       // Add details to the new row
00128     QTableWidgetItem *mypFileNameItem= new QTableWidgetItem(myGuid);
00129     tblCrops->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypFileNameItem);
00130     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myCrop.name());
00131     tblCrops->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypNameItem);
00132       //display an icon indicating if the layerset is local or remote (e.g. terralib)
00133       //LaCrop::Origin myOrigin = myCrop.origin();
00134       //if (myOrigin==LaCrop::USERPROFILE)
00135       //{
00136     QIcon myIcon;
00137     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00138     mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00139       //}
00140       //else if (myOrigin==LaCrop::ADAPTERPROFILE)
00141       //{
00142       //QIcon myIcon;
00143       //myIcon.addFile(":/remotedata.png");
00144       //mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00145       //}
00146       //else if (myOrigin==LaCrop::UNDEFINED)
00147       //{
00148       //  mypNameItem->setTextColor(Qt::yellow);
00149       //}
00150     myCurrentRow++;
00151   }
00152 
00153   if (myCurrentRow>0)
00154   {
00155     tblCrops->setCurrentCell(mySelectedRow,1);
00156     cellClicked(mySelectedRow,1);
00157   }
00158   else
00159   {
00160     on_toolNew_clicked();
00161   }
00162   QStringList headerLabels;
00163   headerLabels << "File Name" << "Name";
00164   tblCrops->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(headerLabels);
00165   tblCrops->setColumnWidth(0,0);
00166   tblCrops->setColumnWidth(1,tblCrops->width());
00167   tblCrops->horizontalHeader()->hide();
00168   tblCrops->verticalHeader()->hide();
00169   tblCrops->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(1,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00170 }
00171 
00172 void LaCropManager::cellClicked(int theRow, int theColumn)
00173 {
00174     //note we use the alg name not the id because user may have customised params
00175   qDebug() << "LaCropManager::cellClicked";
00176   QString myGuid = tblCrops->item(tblCrops->currentRow(),0)->text();
00177   qDebug() << "Guid is: " << myGuid;
00178   QString myFileName = myGuid + ".xml";
00179   selectCrop(myFileName);
00180 }
00181 void LaCropManager::selectCrop(QString theFileName)
00182 {
00183   qDebug() << "selectCrop Called : " << theFileName;
00184   QString myCropDir = LaUtils::userCropProfilesDirPath();
00185   LaCrop myCrop;
00186   myCrop.fromXmlFile(myCropDir + QDir::separator() + theFileName);
00187   leName->setText(myCrop.name());
00188   mCrop=myCrop;
00189   showCrop();
00190 }
00191 
00192 void LaCropManager::showCrop()
00193 {
00194   leName->setText(mCrop.name());
00195   leDescription->setText(mCrop.description());
00196   sbCropYield->setValue(mCrop.cropYield());
00197   sbCropCalories->setValue(mCrop.cropCalories());
00198   sbCropFodderProduction->setValue(mCrop.fodderProduction());
00199   sbCropFodderValue->setValue(mCrop.fodderValue());
00200   cbAreaUnits->setCurrentIndex(mCrop.areaUnits());
00201   cbFodderEnergyType->setCurrentIndex(mCrop.cropFodderEnergyType());
00202   lblCropPix->setPixmap(mCrop.imageFile());
00203 }

00216 void LaCropManager::on_toolNew_clicked()
00217 {
00218   qDebug() << "New toolbutton clicked";
00219   LaCrop myCrop;
00220   myCrop.setGuid();
00221   mCrop = myCrop;
00222   showCrop();

00225 void LaCropManager::resizeEvent ( QResizeEvent * theEvent )
00226 {
00227   tblCrops->setColumnWidth(0,0);
00228   tblCrops->setColumnWidth(1,tblCrops->width());
00229   tblCrops->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(1,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00230 }

00232 void LaCropManager::on_toolCopy_clicked()
00233 {
00234   qDebug() << "Copy toolbutton clicked";
00235   if (tblCrops->currentRow() < 0)
00236   {
00237     return;
00238   }
00239     //to clone, we get the algorithm guid that is currently selected
00240   QString myGuid = tblCrops->item(tblCrops->currentRow(),0)->text();
00241   if (myGuid.isEmpty())
00242   {
00243     return;
00244   }
00245   QString myOriginalFileName = LaUtils::userCropProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml";
00246   LaCrop myCrop;
00247   myCrop.fromXmlFile(myOriginalFileName);
00248   /*
00249   int myCount = 1;
00250   while (mCrop.contains(myProfileName))
00251   {
00252     myProfileName = tr("Copy ") + QString::number(myCount++) + " of " + myCrop.name();
00253   }
00254   */
00255     //assign this layerset its own guid
00256   myCrop.setGuid();
00257   QString myNewFileName = LaUtils::userCropProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myCrop.guid() + ".xml";
00258   myCrop.setName(tr("Copy of ") + myCrop.name());
00259   myCrop.toXmlFile(myNewFileName);
00260   refreshCropTable(myCrop.guid());
00261 }
00262 void LaCropManager::on_toolDelete_clicked()
00263 {
00264   qDebug() << "Delete toolbutton clicked";
00265   if (tblCrops->currentRow() < 0)
00266   {
00267     return;
00268   }
00269   QString myGuid = tblCrops->item(tblCrops->currentRow(),0)->text();
00270   if (!myGuid.isEmpty())
00271   {
00272     QFile myFile(LaUtils::userCropProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml");
00273     if (!myFile.remove())
00274     {
00275       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Landuse Analyst"),
00276       tr("Unable to delete file \n") + myFile.fileName());
00277     }
00278     refreshCropTable();
00279   }
00280 }
00281 void LaCropManager::on_pbnApply_clicked()
00282 {
00283   mCrop.setName(leName->text());
00284   mCrop.setDescription(leDescription->text());
00285   mCrop.setCropYield(sbCropYield->value());
00286   mCrop.setCropCalories(sbCropCalories->value());
00287   mCrop.setFodderProduction(sbCropFodderProduction->value());
00288   mCrop.setCropFodderValue(sbCropFodderValue->value());
00289   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(cbAreaUnits->currentText());
00290   AreaUnits myAreaUnits;
00291   if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum")
00292   {
00293     myAreaUnits = Dunum;
00294     mCrop.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00295   }
00296   else if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Hectare")
00297   {
00298     myAreaUnits = Hectare;
00299     mCrop.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00300   }
00301 
00302   mCrop.setImageFile(mImageFile);
00303   mCrop.toXmlFile( LaUtils::userCropProfilesDirPath() +
00304       QDir::separator() + mCrop.guid() + ".xml");
00305   refreshCropTable(mCrop.guid());
00306 }
